body: Hi, Just an idea, may it be worthy that you create your materials with the default reflectances, cluster them and create a user object with it? Like: Inside the cluster [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/klx1aEk42WqJRVj7s3zS2eZrvclR8uIxaFadOrKea*qRp6328fdj1SlIJ3S7sE6PjfDZQtDIrMbZCQP8afn-zUjFtzuBQ6jL/insidecluster.PNG) Outside the cluster [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/klx1aEk42WpFMXu019vyqVEX0I7BBm50B-hgXtVPI**mWLa9m0aeBjmsKPJtQ2Wa20vuzJeHXaZvd9L*dy5ef927QaLqVN1b/result.PNG) Julia
